amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate and establish points of order to ensure the United States adequately funds national defense with a whole-of-government investment plan for strategic competition with the People's Republic of China.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1523, under the order of 5/19/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 198.

action.text: Amendment SA 1523 proposed by Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 1502. (consideration: CR S3175-3180; text: CR S3175-3176) To express the sense of the Senate and establish points of order to ensure the United States adequately funds national defense with a whole-of-government investment plan for strategic competition with the People's Republic of China.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1523, under the order of 5/19/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 198.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1523, under the order of 5/19/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 198.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1523 proposed by Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 1502.
